## ColorHSL.toObject() method

Returns the [ColorHSL](./fast-colors.colorhsl.md) formatted as an object.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
toObject(): {
        h: number;
        s: number;
        l: number;
    };
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`{ h: number; s: number; l: number; }`
